title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 51.4 - Register of apprentices and term of service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 51.4 - Register of apprentices and term of service

State Regulations
A register, or registers, of apprentices shall be kept by the

Secretary. The term of service of each apprentice shall date from the day upon
which the applicant's acceptance is ordered by the commissioners to be in
effect and no person shall become an apprentice without such
order. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
51.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
